result.execSummary:
The defendant Lamont Chappell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank; pay all appropriate costs UNLESS ALREADY PAID. Pay all applicable costs and surcharges by 04-19-2020 or civil judgment will be entered with tax intercept.
With 25 days credit; TIME SERVED DISPOSITION

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lamont Chappell

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Lamont Chappell in custody.  Kelly Hedge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Statements made as to sentencing by State, Defense and Defendant.

Defendant sentenced to serve TWENTY-FIVE (25) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for TWENTY-FIVE (25) DAYS time served.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

OTHER CONDITIONS:

* Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges BY 04-19-2020 or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered WITH tax intercept.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs UNLESS APREADY PAID.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Post-conviction Relief;
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court, defendant Lamont L Chappell not in court, in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case remains calendared for sentencing 4/19/17 in branch 33.
Matter is ADJOURNED to 04-05-2017 at 02:30 pm for Status.  sdg

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Lamont Chappell in custody.  Kelly Hedge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

State moved to REVOKE.  Defense and Defendant conceded that there is a FACTUAL basis for the REVOCATION.  The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of judgment of conviction.  Status conference scheduled for March 15, 2017 at 02:30 pm.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 19, 2017 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in Court.  Defendant Lamont Chappell not in Court, in custody.  Dave T Malone appeared on behalf of the State.  sdg

Bail motion by the state argued and granted by the Court.  Bail $300.00 CASH.
By Agreement of the Parties,  matter is RESCHEDULED to Br. 33 for Plea/Sentencing.  sdg

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defendant advised that while he was in treatment his residence was moved to a different location by the landlord.  Defense advised that the State will be moving to REVOKE due to additional charges being issued.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Revocation/Sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 25, 2017 at 02:30 pm.
TURNOVER TO JUSTICEPOINT FOR PLACEMENT.  UPON PLACEMENT BAIL TO REVERT TO $200.00 PR BOND.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court, defendant Lamont Chappell not in court, in custody.  Jeff Altenburg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense WAIVED the appearance of the Defendant for the purposes of today's hearing.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TURNED OVER TO JUSTICEPOINT FOR PLACEMENT.  UPON PLACEMENT BAIL TO REVERT TO $200.00 PR BOND.  Matter remains scheduled for Review on 01-03-2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defense advised that Defendant is on the waitlist for residential Placement.  Defendant has an intake appointment for IOP TOMORROW (11-29-2016).  Defense advised that the State would not contest the Restitution being converted to a Civil Judgment.  State advised that after Defendant gets into Placement,  the State can resolve the case.  Defense advised that the idea was for Defendant to be in Residential by thie date.  Court went off the Record to hold Sidebar in Chambers.  Hearing continued on the Record.  Defendant is still on the waitlist for Residential.  On Motion of the State,  Court converted the amount of Restitution payable to MILWAUKEE POLICE DEPARTMENT in the amount of ONE HUNDRED FIFTY-FOUR DOLLARS AND SEVENTY-THREE CENTS.  Tax intercept to apply.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for January 3, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearinf proceeded on the Record.  Defense advised that Defendant has completed his medicap appointment and received medication.  Defendant is on the waitlist for residential.  Defendant is seeing therapy THREE (3) times per WEEK.  Defense requested a THIRTY (30) DAY adjournment.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for November 28, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Lamont Chappell in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Prior to matter being called on the Record,  case was Staffed in Chambers.  Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for October 24, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense has made EXTENSIVE attempts to get in contact with the Defendant.  Deputy advised that Defendant has picked up TWO (2) cases.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  State moved to REMAND.  Defense objected citing Medical issues.  Court went off the Record to hold Sidebar.  Hearing continued on the Record.  COURT DID NOT MODIFY BAIL.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33  Review hearing scheduled for September 27, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Barbara K Due for Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised that Defendant's Case Manager through the City of Milwaukee DHS contacted Attorney Rablin and advised that the Defendant had been in the Hospital from 08/09/2016 to 08/18/2016.  Defense advised that Defendant was a witness to the shooting that occurred on the 18th of August.  Defense advised that Defendant has severe medical issues.  Defense advised that Defendant FULLY intended to comply with the terms of the DPA but that he was hospitalized due to the severe medical issues.  Court RELEASED Defendant from custody and ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.

  Review hearing scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised the Court of Defendant's medical issues.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.
Signature bond and all bond conditions previously ordered to continue. Bail was not forfeited at missed appearance 7/12/16.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Lamont Chappell in custody.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 33.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Lamont Chappell not in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  nam

Court ordered case adjourned for a review hearing.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Review hearing scheduled for July 12, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defense advised that Defendant has been having medical issues.  Defendant does have a Community Support person who works with him.  Defense advised that within TWO (2) WEEKS Defendant will be able to provide HALF of the ordered Restitution.  State advised that Defense was to provide documentation regarding the medical issues.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

COURT VACATED THE STAYED WARRANT FROM THE PREVIOUS HEARING.

Defendant has had numerous medical issues since the last hearing.  Defense will need to verify the documentation.  State did not object to an adjournment.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for May 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised that the Defendant tends to be slightly tardy in appearances.  Defense advised that Defendant suffers from significant mental health issues.  Defense has contact information for Case managers for the Defendant.  COURT ISSUED AND STAYED A BENCH WARRANT UNTI LTHE NEXT DATE.  Review hearing scheduled for April 19, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
(2).  On behalf of Defendant.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defendant has not fully paid restitution.  State does not oppose an adjournment to allow Defendant time to pay restitution.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.

  Review hearing scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised the Court that Fokus felt that Acacia would be a better location for the Defendant.  Defense advised that Defendant is consistently taking his medication.  Defense will produce written documentation regarding medication and treatment.  Defendant has restitution left.  Defense requested a THIRTY (30 DAY adjournment.  State does NOT object.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense reports that Defendant has NOT been attending programming.  Court holds colloquy with Defendant.  Court admonished Defendant.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defendant is working with his Case Managers from 'Housing First'.  Defense will clarify as to what treatments are in effect.  Defense requests a brief adjournment.  State does NOT object.  Court orders matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Fokus Family Service progress report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant testing negative.   Based upon the defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant appeared late.  Court withdraws bench warrant previously issued.  Court orders case adjourned for Review Hearing to Branch 33.
  Review hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant missed court due to hospitalization.  Defendant was discharged from Matt Talbot.  Defendant is now being monitored by Fokus Family Services and the Public Defenders office and attended the Guest House.  Defendant is enrolled in Anger Management.    All parties notified, effective August 1, 2015 this case is assigned to Judge Carl Ashley, Branch 33, in room 113 in the Safety Building.  Any right of substitution begins to run as of the date of receipt of this notice, unless notified by the court on an earlier date.  Review hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Previously posted bail to remain.  Scheduling conference scheduled for 07-06-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 7/6/15 at 8:30am, Branch 06.vb

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court.  Anthony E. White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
*CASE HEARD WITHOUT CIRCUIT COURT FILE*
Matter before the Court due to non-compliance.  Defense requests time to contact the defendant.  On defense motion, the Court orders Bench Warrant Issued but STAYED.  Calendar call scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement, weekly report, received and filed.   lms

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.
Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum  and Elements/Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 6.
As a condition of bail, court order the defendant may not possess dangerous weapons or firearms or apply for a conceal carry permit.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Court vacates the stayed warrant.    Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defense waived reading and momentarily enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of client.  Review hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Lamont Chappell in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  OFF THE RECORD.    Court orders case adjourned for Calendar Call in Branch 6.  Calendar call scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Attorney Dawn Marie Rablin in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant is currently in residential treatment.    Defendant does not appear.  Defense request Court impose and stay a warrant.  State has no objection. Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Court appearance scheduled in Room 310, Safety Building, on 5/12/15 @ 10:00am
